name: CRUD Test

testSteps.description: Given Pet store Application running
When I create new user by providing the information id "01" username "shah" firstName"makan" lastName "patel"  email "m123@gmail.com" password"password1" phone "0203456535"userStatus "active"

exception.message:
Couldn't convert "active" to an instance of: [class java.lang.Integer, int]
---- Debugging information ----
-------------------------------
-------------------------------

stackTrace.methodName: When I create new user by providing the information id "01" username "shah" firstName"makan" lastName "patel"  email "m123@gmail.com" password"password1" phone "0203456535"userStatus "active"

testSteps.description: Then I get that created user  with "shah" is created
And I update the user with information  id "01" username "shah" firstName"makan" lastName "patel"  email "m123@gmail.com" password"password1" phone "0203456535"userStatus "active"
And I verify user updated with "shah" successfully
And I delete created user with username "shah"
Then The user deleted successfully
